rules_text:
[i]({T}: Add {U}.)[/i]
[i][i]Wanderlust[/i] [/i]– Otherworldly Island enters tapped unless you control four or more other differently named lands.
{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.
flavor_text: [i]I saw above me that endless skyway...[/i]
notes: This Land is Your Land by Woody Guthrie
